name: Legend of Demons
description:
This game was made for the Retrograde game jam, with some help from Noahcomposer11.

CONTROLS Battle

Movement: Arrow keys
Primary weapon: X
Secondary weapon: Z

Overworld

Movement: Arrow keys
Interact: X
Open menu: Enter

Welcome to the demo for Legend of Demons! General Dyntan has entrusted you with a mission.  After the nefarious Dr. Skelebone broke into the Federation For Safety's headquarters, he stole the eight Power Orbs — mystical artifacts used for the Power Beacon, a device which kills monsters as soon as they appear. With the Beacon disabled, monsters can roam freely and destroy whatever they wish.

Your job is to locate the eight Power Orbs — starting with the Red Orb in the demo — and restart the Power Beacon.

Choose from one of four classes to fight off Dr. Skelebone's armies:

  • The Fighter, equipped with a sword for slashing and a shield for bashing, focuses on power and resilience. Good at melee combat, but has slow speed and is vulnerable to projectiles.
  • The Archer, equipped with a bow and small dagger, has well-rounded stats and excels at ranged combat. Good at sniping enemies from behind cover, but has slow attack speed and is vulnerable up close.
  • The Rogue, equipped with a small dagger and throwing knives, focuses on speed. Excels at wearing enemies down, but has a tough time against armour.
  • The Wizard, equipped with a magic book and staff, focuses on strong projectiles that can harm multiple enemies. Good against armoured foes, but tends to struggle against fast targets.
